rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {4702, S2009}

description: The internship gives Food Science and Technology students the opportunity to apply their university learning to the work place, providing students with experience in tailoring their academic-based learning to the needs of an industry-based partner, and to network with potential employers. This will prepare students for work or professional practice by integrating theoretical knowledge with practice. Students will learn about the process of applying for employment and good workplace practice. The internship will generally be over the summer break and commence in December. It can be taken any time after the completion of Level Two.
